Alright. I did reply to this post already but Hotmail's a bit on the slow 
side this week. So here it is again.

Desmonus:

* Desmonus felt her head hit something hard, which little did she know that 
it was BloodyStrikes knee-plate.
She heard him, or somebot, yell behind her as she crashed into him, both of 
them flying down the hall way and right into another bot, reptilica.
She saw a faint glimps of both of them just before everything stopped with a 
bang, right into the wall leading off into the next hall passage.

The ship continued to rock as the base was being hauled to the Pit knew 
where, and as far as she was concerned she didn't really care.
Desmonus had hit her head pretty hard and it was almost as if small lights 
were dancing infront of her optics, making her want to bat them away.
But with a growing pain in her head she simply closed her optics and let the 
darkness take her, the pain fading out just as her conciousness did.*


IR:

* She simply sighed as she watched Prowl stumble towards her a but, seeing 
his broken wing like that and what pain he was in.
He was rather a pitiful sight at the moment, looking a bit pathetic as if he 
had just come out of a dryer.
Iron Raptor just stood there and shook her head, knowing that Prowl wouldn't 
give up until he was either going to the Ark with her of going back to base 
with her proping him up all the way back. Eather way, he was going with her.
But with him like this now, it was risky to take him with her. But she 
wasn't going back and he wasn't about to stop following her either.
So, there was only one salution.

Iron Raptor walked up to Prowl and bumped her shoulder against his waist, 
enough to get the point but not enough to knock him over.
She looked towards the forest as she waited  for him to climb onto her back. 
And if he refused then she would have to insist. And at the moment he didn't 
stand a chance against her in an arguement.

The forst was the fastest way to the Ark, or what was left of it. But with 
Prowl she would have to take the long way, mainly so that he wouldn't ge 
smacked in the face with brnaches.
She sighed and looked back at him.*

" On the way you should activate your repair system, have you as good as new 
by the time we get to the Ark. I'll need able hands to help me dig Iris out 
of the wreckage."
